name: NZ Squash Open
description: Get ready for world-class action as the NZ Squash Open returns in 2026! This premier international tournament will showcase the world’s top professional players alongside New Zealand’s rising stars, all competing for glory on court.

location.name: Isaac Theatre Royal
location.address: Isaac Theatre Royal, Christchurch View map

text_for_embedding: NZ Squash Open | Get ready for world-class action as the NZ Squash Open returns in 2026! This premier international tournament will showcase the world’s top professional players alongside New Zealand’s rising stars, all competing for glory on court. | Isaac Theatre Royal, Christchurch View map | Christchurch | Canterbury | 3 - 8 March 2026 Address Isaac Theatre Royal, Christchurch View map Ticket info Buy tickets now Event details Expect fast-paced rallies, breath-taking skill, and an electric atmosphere as Christchurch hosts the biggest squash event in the country. With men’s and women’s draws stacked with talent, every match promises drama, intensity, and unforgettable moments. Whether you’re a passionate squash fan or new to the sport, the NZ Squash Open is an event you won’t want to miss. Secure your seats today and be part of the excitement as history is made on the glass court! Get valuable updates and news straight to your inbox. name: Crankworx Christchurch
description: Crankworx Christchurch 2026 is coming in hot! From 19 - 22 February, Crankworx returns to the Christchurch Adventure Park. Be part of the action.
text_for_embedding: Crankworx Christchurch | Crankworx Christchurch 2026 is coming in hot! From 19 - 22 February, Crankworx returns to the Christchurch Adventure Park. Be part of the action. | Christchurch Adventure Park View map | Christchurch | Canterbury | 19 - 22 February 2026 Address Christchurch Adventure Park View map Ticket info Buy tickets Crankworx Christchurch event details From 19 - 22 February, the world’s best mountain bikers will descend on Christchurch Adventure Park for a four-day celebration of speed, skill, and the wild side of MTB. Expect action-packed events, family-friendly vibes, and the electric festival atmosphere Crankworx is known for, all set against Canterbury’s iconic Port Hills. Whether you’re a die-hard fan or just keen for an epic summer day out, tickets are on sale now, with options for fans of all ages. Don’t miss your chance to witness gravity-defying talent right here in Ōtautahi. Get valuable updates and news straight to your inbox. name: World Buskers Festival
description: Get amongst the fun this summer as the World Buskers Festival returns to Ōtautahi Christchurch for ten days of street performance, ticketed shows, and pop-up surprises across the city.
text_for_embedding: World Buskers Festival | Get amongst the fun this summer as the World Buskers Festival returns to Ōtautahi Christchurch for ten days of street performance, ticketed shows, and pop-up surprises across the city. | Multiple venues across the city | Christchurch | Canterbury | 23 January - 1 February 2025 Address Multiple venues across the city Ticket info Visit website Event details This summer the streets of Ōtautahi Christchurch come alive with laughter, spectacle, and the kind of unexpected moments that make the World Buskers Festival one of our most loved festivals. From Friday, 23 January to Sunday, 1 February 2026, across the five city pitches and two pop-up locations, the festival blends the best of international street talent with the creativity and spirit of homegrown performers. Expect jaw-dropping acrobatics, cheeky comedy, world-class circus acts, and unforgettable moments in every corner of the central city. Get valuable updates and news straight to your inbox. name: New Years Eve
description: Ring in the new year at North Hagley Park with family friendly fun. With a ‘kids countdown’ from 4-7pm, followed by a New Years Eve party from 8pm - midnight featuring Kora, with support from local acts Dillastrate, Brad Staley and DJ Sambora.
text_for_embedding: New Years Eve | Ring in the new year at North Hagley Park with family friendly fun. With a ‘kids countdown’ from 4-7pm, followed by a New Years Eve party from 8pm - midnight featuring Kora, with support from local acts Dillastrate, Brad Staley and DJ Sambora. | North Hagley Park View map | Christchurch | Canterbury | 31 December 2025 Address North Hagley Park View map Ticket info Find out more Event details Say hello to 2026 with New Years Eve celebrations in North Hagley Park. NYE Kids Countdown, 4-7pm - powered with Hydrate by IHF, is kicking off the New Year’s Eve celebrations early with a special kids’ event that your whānau won’t want to miss. Join the fun without having to stay out late! NYE25 8pm to midnight - featuring Kora, with support from local acts Dillastrate, Brad Staley and DJ Sambora, all MCed by Henare Kaa. description: Super Round heads to New Zealand for the first time, opening One New Zealand Stadium Christchurch.

name: Supercars Christchurch Super 440
description: Ōtautahi Christchurch is geared up to welcome the Repco Supercars Championship to Ruapuna Motorsport Park.

location.name: Ruapuna Motorsport Park
location.address: Ruapuna Motorsport Park, Christchurch View map

price.text: Multiple transport options will be available to make getting to Ruapuna Raceway easy and hassle-free over the event weekend. View directions Google Maps . Spectators parking here will need to show a valid ticket to the event (including all passengers in the vehicle) and a valid NZ mobility parking permit clearly displayed on the front windscreen of the vehicle. Entry to this carpark for valid mobility car parking permits is free.

text_for_embedding: Supercars Christchurch Super 440 | Ōtautahi Christchurch is geared up to welcome the Repco Supercars Championship to Ruapuna Motorsport Park. | Ruapuna Motorsport Park, Christchurch View map | Christchurch | Canterbury | 17 - 19 April 2026 Address Ruapuna Motorsport Park, Christchurch View map Ticket info Buy tickets Supercars event details As Australasia’s premier touring car series, Supercars promises high-octane action, fierce competition and an unforgettable experience — and we can’t wait to see it all unfold right here in Christchurch in 2026. For the first time, drivers will battle it out on the iconic South Island circuit — led by Kiwi star Matt Payne, winner of the Jason Richards Memorial Trophy and now Bathurst 1000 champion. Fans from across Aotearoa can rally trackside to cheer on their 'King of the Mountain. ' Event weekend transport options available Multiple transport options will be available to make getting to Ruapuna Raceway easy and hassle-free over the event weekend. View directions Google Maps . Super shuttle from the city A 'Super shuttle service' will be running from the central city. This is a paid morning and nightly service, and return shuttle tickets can be purchased starting from $30. Free park n ride service There will be a free Supercars park n ride service running from the Canterbury Agricultural Park. With no booking necessary, attendees can drive to the Canterbury Agricultural Park, park their vehicle and take the free shuttle to the raceway. View directions on Google Maps . Free parking on-site There is free parking onsite, however this is limited and will be allocated on a first in first served basis. Overflows will need to head to the Canterbury Agricultural Park and take the free shuttle service to the event, or ticket holders can purchase a shuttle service to and from the city. Limited premium carparking There is also an option to purchase a premium carpark. This $120 add-on will score you a 3-day carpark just outside an entry gate. There is limited availability, and tickets need to be purchased online prior to arriving at the event. Upgrades underway at Ruapuna Raceway As Christchurch prepares to host Supercars, Ruapuna Raceway is undergoing targeted upgrades to meet track safety standards for its inaugural year. Led by the Canterbury Car Club and supported by Christchurch City Council, ChristchurchNZ, and Supercars, the immediate focus is on ensuring the circuit complies with all safety requirements for drivers and spectators. Infrastructure enhancements will continue in subsequent years, building on this foundation to elevate the venue into a world-class motorsport destination. Accessibility information An accessible viewing area will be located between turn 10 and turn 11, near gate B. Please purchase a Trackside General Admission ticket and email commercial@ticketek.co.nz to advise your requirements. The venue is a mix of sealed roads, dirt roads and grass. Viewing areas around the track are all raised above the racetrack, and therefore, there is a requirement to navigate inclines and descents around the venue. Corporate tickets can be purchased for the Engine Room, which caters to those using a wheelchair. There are also a number of wheelchair-friendly toilets in the precinct. Accessible parking Accessible parking will be located in the premium carpark. There are limited carparks in this location, which will be on a first-come, first-served basis. Spectators parking here will need to show a valid ticket to the event (including all passengers in the vehicle) and a valid NZ mobility parking permit clearly displayed on the front windscreen of the vehicle. Entry to this carpark for valid mobility car parking permits is free. If the carpark is full, patrons can head to the public carpark or to the park n ride at the Canterbury Agricultural Park (A&P showgrounds, 102 Curletts Road, Sockburn, Christchurch). Accessible buses will be operating throughout the day. Check back here for updates as more action unfolds in the lead-up to Supercars Christchurch Super 440 . name: The Art of Banksy
description: Enjoy over 150 original artworks, prints, and installations by the elusive street artist. This is your final chance to experience Banksy’s most iconic pieces in New Zealand.

location.address: Te Pae Christchurch Convention Centre View map

text_for_embedding: The Art of Banksy | Enjoy over 150 original artworks, prints, and installations by the elusive street artist. This is your final chance to experience Banksy’s most iconic pieces in New Zealand. | Te Pae Christchurch Convention Centre View map | Christchurch | Canterbury | 17 December 2025 - 27 January 2026 (excluding public holidays) Address Te Pae Christchurch Convention Centre View map Ticket info Buy tickets now Event details The world-famous exhibition, The Art of Banksy, is coming to Christchurch this summer at Te Pae Christchurch Convention Centre. With over 150 original artworks, prints, and installations by the elusive street artist, this is your final chance to experience Banksy’s most iconic and thought-provoking pieces in Aotearoa NZ. From Girl with Balloon (Gold Edition) to Flower Thrower, this is an unmissable opportunity to get up close to authenticated Banksy artworks. Get valuable updates and news straight to your inbox. name: Lexus Urban Polo
description: The Lexus Urban Polo® returns to the beautiful Hagley Park, Christchurch on Saturday, 21 February 2026. Get amongst all the action on and off the field.

price.text: This is an R18 event, 12:00 – 7:30pm • Doors open 12:00pm Ticket info Find out more Be part of the action Get amongst all the action on and off the field. Watch thrilling, fast paced polo matches, stomp the divots, try polo for yourself on top of our hitting boxes, meet the polo players, check out our epic DJ line-up on the main stage, enjoy the delicious offerings from our food and beverage partners or try out one of the activations. Tickets on sale now for General Admission, VIP and Corporate Hosting in our Private Marquees. It’s truly an experience like no other! Get valuable updates and news straight to your inbox.
